title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding

Description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Set the key blank in the properties file, but ensure it has a valid value.

Actual Result (OB):
In the properties file, leave the key blank, but provide a valid value.
Expected Result (EB):
The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.

Steps to reproduce (SR):
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
